item.title: 中国滴滴第一季度营收增长 8.5%，复苏步伐加快
item.description: 中国打车公司滴滴出行周四公布，2025 年第一季度营收增长 8.5%，达到 533 亿元人民币（74.2 亿美元），该公司从监管部门对其业务的全面整顿中复苏的步伐正在加快。【原文：Chinese ride-hailing company Didi Global reported an 8.5% rise in revenue in the first quarter of 2025 to 53.3 billion yuan ($7.42 billion) on Thursday, as its recovery from a regulatory overhaul of its operations gathered pace.】

item.title: SMMT 数据显示，电动汽车折扣吸引买家，英国 5 月新车销量回升
item.description: 英国汽车制造商和贸易商协会（SMMT）周四发布的一份报告显示，在电动汽车制造商大幅打折的情况下，英国5月份新车销量环比增长，这是2025年以来英国新车销量第二个月出现复苏。【原文：Britain's new car sales rose from a year earlier in May, marking the second month of recovery in 2025, amid heavy discounting by electric vehicle makers, a report by the Society of Motor Manufacturers and Traders (SMMT) showed on Thursday.】

item.title: OpenAI 发现更多中国团体恶意使用 ChatGPT
item.description: OpenAI 发现，越来越多的中国组织利用其人工智能技术开展秘密行动，这家 ChatGPT 制造商在周四发布的一份报告中对此进行了描述。【原文：OpenAI is seeing an increasing number of Chinese groups using its artificial intelligence technology for covert operations, which the ChatGPT maker described in a report released Thursday.】

item.title: Metals Focus称，各国央行有望在第四年大规模购买黄金
item.description: Metals Focus 咨询公司称，全球央行有望在 2025 年购买 1000 公吨黄金，这将是它们第四年大规模购买黄金，因为它们将储备从美元资产分散到金银中。【原文：Central banks worldwide are on track to buy 1,000 metric tons of gold in 2025, which would be their fourth year of massive purchases as they diversify reserves from dollar-denominated assets into bullion, consultancy Metals Focus said.】

item.title: 英国央行调查显示：英国企业抵御美国关税影响
item.description: 英国央行周四的一项调查显示，很少有英国企业预计会受到美国贸易政策近期变化的直接影响，只有12%的企业将其列为三大不确定性来源之一。【原文：Few British businesses expect to be directly affected by recent changes in U.S. trade policy, with only 12% naming it as one of their top three sources of uncertainty, a Bank of England survey showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国比亚迪明年将把南非经销商网络扩大近两倍
item.description: 中国电动汽车巨头比亚迪的一位高管告诉路透社，比亚迪计划到明年将其在南非的经销商网络扩大近两倍，以扩大其在南非的市场份额。【原文：Chinese electric-vehicle giant BYD plans to nearly triple its dealership network in South Africa by next year as it looks to grow its market share in the country, a senior executive told Reuters.】

item.title: 特拉菲古拉上半年净利润略有增长，收入减少
item.description: 全球大宗商品贸易公司创辉集团（Trafigura）周四发布报告称，2025 财年上半年公司净利润同比略有增长，达到约 15.2 亿美元，但由于大宗商品平均价格下跌，公司收入有所下降。【原文：Global commodity trading house Trafigura reported on Thursday that its net profit rose slightly on the year to about $1.52 billion in the first half of its 2025 financial year, while its revenues fell on lower average commodity prices.】

item.title: 宝洁公司将在两年内裁员 7000 人
item.description: 宝洁公司（Procter & Gamble）周四表示，作为非核心重组计划的一部分，公司将在未来两年内在全球范围内裁员 7000 人，约占非制造业职位的 15%。【原文：Procter & Gamble said on Thursday it would cut 7,000 jobs, or about 15% of its non-manufacturing roles, globally over the next two years as part of its non-core restructuring program.】

item.title: 台湾纬创资通将通过股票出售融资最多 9.23 亿美元
item.description: 据路透社周四查阅的一份条款书显示，台湾电子制造商纬创（Wistron Corp）正寻求通过出售将在卢森堡上市的全球存托股票来筹集高达9.23亿美元的资金。【原文：Taiwanese electronics manufacturer Wistron Corp is looking to raise up to $923 million by selling global depository shares that will be listed in Luxembourg, according to a term sheet reviewed by Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 据《日经新闻》报道，日本将在美国关税谈判中提议就稀土开展合作
item.description: 据《日经商业日报》周四报道，日本正计划在即将举行的关税谈判中提议加强与美国在稀土供应链方面的合作，同时考虑到中国最近采取的出口限制措施。【原文：Japan is planning to propose strengthening cooperation with the United States on rare earth supply chains in upcoming tariff talks, with recent export restrictions by China in mind, the Nikkei business daily reported on Thursday.】

item.title: Fevertree 和 Molson Coors 将分担美国关税成本
item.description: 汤力水生产商Fevertree Drinks周四表示，将与酿酒商Molson Coors平摊英国对美国进口产品征收10%关税的成本，作为双方近期合作的一部分，以减轻短期影响。【原文：Tonic maker Fevertree Drinks said on Thursday it would equally split costs of the 10% tariff to be imposed on the UK imports to the U.S. with brewer Molson Coors , as part of their recent tie-up to mitigate the short-term impact.】

item.title: 普拉达收购意大利皮革集团 Rino Mastrotto 10% 的股份
item.description: 普拉达（Prada）周四表示，它收购了意大利皮革集团 Rino Mastrotto 10%的股份，该奢侈品集团旨在加强对生产流程的控制。【原文：Prada said on Thursday it acquired a 10% stake in Italian leather group Rino Mastrotto, as the luxury group aims to tighten its grip over the production process.】

item.title: 英国维斯公司将把主要上市地迁往美国
item.description: 汇款公司 Wise 周四表示，打算将其主要上市地从伦敦迁至美国，这是最新一家这样做的英国公司。【原文：Money transfer company Wise on Thursday said it intends to move its primary listing to the U.S. from London, the latest British company to do so.】

item.title: 靴子制造商马腾博士将削减美洲和欧洲、中东和非洲地区的折扣
item.description: 英国靴子制造商 Dr Martens 周四表示，将在本财年减少美洲和欧洲、中东和非洲地区的折扣，并预计调整后的税前利润将符合市场预期。【原文：British bootmaker Dr Martens said on Thursday it will reduce discounts in the Americas and EMEA regions in the current financial year and expects adjusted pre-tax profit to be in line with market expectations.】

item.title: 澳大利亚林纳斯公司（Lynas）股价大涨，原因是汽车制造商意识到中国稀土出口限制带来的风险
item.description: 澳大利亚林纳斯稀土公司（Lynas Rare Earths）的股价周四攀升至两年多来的最高点，此前全球汽车制造商警告说，中国对稀土材料的出口限制可能导致生产延误。【原文：Shares of Australia's Lynas Rare Earths climbed on Thursday to their highest point in more than two years, after global automakers warned that China's export restrictions on rare-earth materials could lead to production delays.】

item.title: 威兹航空年度利润下降超过 61%，首席执行官将原因归咎于飞机停飞
item.description: 由于飞机停飞造成的运力限制和顽固的高成本继续拖累业绩，廉价航空公司威兹航空（Wizz Air）周四公布的年度运营利润低于分析师预期。【原文：Budget carrier Wizz Air on Thursday reported an annual operating profit that fell short of analysts' expectations, as capacity constraints due to grounded planes and stubbornly high costs continued to weigh on performance.】

item.title: 文件显示韩国韩华将出售欧洲通信卫星公司股份
item.description: 韩国韩华系统公司（Hanwha Systems）周三提交的一份账簿管理人文件显示，该公司将以约7800万欧元（8500万美元）的价格出售其在欧洲通信卫星公司（Eutelsat）所持有的全部5.4%的股份，因为该卫星运营商正在推进其新的融资计划。【原文：South Korea's Hanwha Systems is offering to sell its entire 5.4% stake in Eutelsat for about 78 million euros ($85 million), a bookrunner filing showed on Wednesday, as the satellite operator moves ahead with its new financing plan.】

item.title: 消息称铃木汽车因中国稀土禁令而停止生产雨燕
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的消息人士称，由于中国对稀土的限制，铃木汽车暂停了雨燕汽车的生产，成为首家受出口限制影响的日本汽车制造商。【原文：Suzuki Motor had suspended production of its Swift car due to China's rare earth restrictions, two sources familiar with the matter said, becoming the first Japanese automaker to be affected by the export curb.】

item.title: 早间竞标：Switch 2 首次亮相，但交易中没有趣味游戏
item.description: 洛基-斯威夫特对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rocky Swift】

item.title: Shein因 "黑暗图案 "遭欧盟消费者组织投诉
item.description: 泛欧消费者组织 BEUC 周四向欧盟委员会投诉在线快时尚零售商 Shein 使用 "黑暗模式"，旨在让人们在其应用程序和网站上购买更多商品。【原文：Pan-European consumers organisation BEUC filed a complaint with the European Commission on Thursday against online fast-fashion retailer Shein over its use of "dark patterns", tactics designed to make people buy more on its app and website.】

item.title: 国际能源署称，2025 年全球能源投资将达到创纪录的 3.3 万亿美元
item.description: 国际能源署（IEA）周四表示，尽管存在经济不确定性和地缘政治紧张局势，但清洁能源支出的激增预计将推动2025年全球能源投资达到创纪录的3.3万亿美元（2.89万亿欧元）。【原文：A surge in clean energy spending is expected to drive a record $3.3 trillion (2.89 trillion euros) in global energy investment in 2025, despite economic uncertainty and geopolitical tensions, the International Energy Agency (IEA) said on Thursday.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）称，对新兴市场国家银行而言，贸易战是比债务危机和债务违约率更严峻的威胁
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）的吉塔-戈皮纳特（Gita Gopinath）说，贸易战的冲击给新兴市场的中央银行带来了不同的影响，这与 COVID 大流行时不同，当时中央银行可以迅速放松货币政策。【原文：The shock from trade war brings differential effects for central banks in emerging markets, in contrast with the COVID pandemic, when they could quickly ease monetary policy, the International Monetary Fund's (IMF) Gita Gopinath said.】

item.title: 花旗将在中国裁减 3500 个技术岗位，作为全球改革的一部分
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc）周四表示，该公司将在中国的两个技术中心减少约 3500 名员工，这是该公司简化和缩减全球技术业务以改善风险和数据管理的努力的一部分。【原文：Citigroup Inc will reduce the number of employees at two of its technology centres in China by about 3,500, the bank said on Thursday, as part of its efforts to simplify and shrink its global tech operations to improve risk and data management.】

item.title: 亚洲股市走高，美元在欧洲央行会议前萎靡不振
item.description: 在欧洲中央银行就动荡的全球经济提出政策展望之前，亚洲股市走高，美元疲软。【原文：Shares in Asia crept higher and the U.S. dollar languished ahead of the European Central Bank offering its policy outlook for a tumultuous global economy.】

item.title: 大多数新兴市场货币将保持涨势
item.description: 路透社（Reuters）对外汇策略师进行的一项民意调查显示，随着交易商放弃助长美元梦幻般上涨的美国例外论交易，大多数新兴市场货币将在未来六个月内保持今年以来的涨势，或扩大兑美元的涨幅。【原文：Most emerging market currencies will hold the gains they have made this year or extend them against a retreating dollar in the next six months as traders ditch the U.S. exceptionalism trade that fuelled the greenback's dream run, a Reuters poll of FX strategists found.】

item.title: 澳大利亚四月份家庭支出微增 0.1
item.description: 周四的数据显示，4月份澳大利亚家庭支出仅略有增长，这进一步表明，尽管借贷利率下降、通胀降温，但消费仍落后于收入增长。【原文：Australian household spending rose only marginally in April, data showed on Thursday, a further sign consumption was still lagging income growth despite a drop in borrowing rates and cooling inflation.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，金佰利接近以 35 亿美元将全球生活用纸业务出售给 Suzano
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》援引知情人士的话报道，金佰利即将以约 35 亿美元的价格向巴西纸浆制造商 Suzano 出售其在北美以外的 Kleenex 和纸巾业务。【原文：Kimberly-Clark is nearing a sale of its Kleenex and tissue businesses outside of North America for around $3.5 billion to Brazilian pulpmaker Suzano , the Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 越南发送文件回应美国贸易要求
item.description: 越南工贸部在周四的一份声明中表示，越南已提交了一份文件，对美国的贸易要求做出回应，并表达了在此问题上寻求共同声音的 "决心和善意"。【原文：Vietnam has submitted a document responding to U.S. trade requests and expressed its "determination and goodwill" in finding a common voice on the issue, its Ministry of Industry and Trade said in a statement on Thursday.】

item.title: 经济数据疲软，贸易不确定性挥之不去，美元走势疲软
item.description: 周四，美元走软，停留在六周低点附近，此前疲软的美国经济数据再次引发了对经济增长缓慢和通胀高企的担忧，而欧元在欧洲央行降息预期出台前持稳。【原文：The dollar softened on Thursday, stuck near six-week lows after weak U.S. economic data revived fears of slow growth and high inflation, while the euro was steady ahead of an expected interest rate cut from the European Central Bank.】

item.title: 任天堂 Switch 2 全球发售，被压抑的需求预计将出现短缺
item.description: 任天堂的 Switch 2 于本周四推出，人们普遍预计这款功能更强大的下一代游戏设备将在全球供不应求。【原文：Nintendo's Switch 2 launched on Thursday and is widely expected to be in short supply globally amid pent-up demand for the more powerful next-generation gaming device.】
